message.content:
cs.NI, cs.IT, cs.SY, cs.MM, cs.CR 

This paper discusses methods to improve the power efficiency of cellular networks, which involves topics related to network infrastructure, communication systems, and information theory. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture). The paper also discusses cognitive radio and cooperative relaying, which are related to signal processing and communication theory, making cs.IT (Information Theory) another likely category. The paper also proposes a research vision to make these technologies more energy efficient, which involves control systems and optimization, making cs.SY (Systems and Control) a possible category. The paper also discusses the deployment of micro, pico, and femto-cells, which involves multimedia systems and applications, making cs.MM (Multimedia) another possible category. Lastly, the paper discusses broader perspectives in realizing a "green" cellular network technology, which involves security and cryptography, making cs.CR (Cryptography and Security) a possible category.
